description: Orderly Network Indexer API for querying trading metrics, account events, volume statistics, and rankings.

endpoints.summary: Get daily Perpetual trading information
endpoints.description: This api will return `trading_fee`, `trading_count`, `trading_user_count`, `liquidation_amount`: `liquidation_count` and `opening_count` infomation of OrderlyNetwork between `from_days` and `end_days`.

endpoints.summary: Get daily Trading fee information
Get daily Trading volume information

parameters.name: param
parameters.description:
Daily volume params, with day format %Y-%m-%d 

example: {"from_day": "2025-07-12", "end_day": "2025-07-17" }

endpoints.summary: Get token deposit in recent days information

responses.description: Get Token Deposit in recent days response

endpoints.summary: Get User perp position info ranking by holding

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: position ranking params, `address` nor `broker_id` should not apear with `account_id`, `symbol` is optional, `offset` and `limit` has default value of `0` and `30`

endpoints.summary: Get user perpetual info ranking by realized_pnl information
Get daily Trading Volume ranking information

parameters.name: param
parameters.description:
Position ranking params, days param is the range of recent days 

example: {"days": 1, "size": 10}

endpoints.summary: Get token withdrawal in recent days information

responses.description: Get Token Withdraw in recent days response

endpoints.summary: Get user token/trading events informations[This api is deprecated as it may return too manay data without pagelization, please use `/events_v2` api]

responses.description: Get Account events response on orderly

endpoints.summary: Get user token/trading events informations with pagelization

requestBody.description:
account events, filter by `account_id` or `broker_id` + `address`, timestamp of `from_time` and `to_time`, `from_time` has a defualt value of two weeks ago, `to_time` has a default value of current timestamp, and `event_type` is optinal `enum` with value "`TRANSACTION` | `PERPTRADE` | `SETTLEMENT` | `LIQUIDATION` | `ADL`. if `event_type` is not be set, this api will return all events without filtering by type.


All of `TRANSACTION` and `ADL` events will be returned at first page of the request, without `***_event_next_cursor` params in the request body.

If the returning events data have `PERPTRADE` events, and `trading_event_next_cursor` is not null in response, the `PERPTRADE` events were paginated, need to take `trading_event_next_cursor` into request body to query next page of `PERPTRADE` events.

If the returning events data have `SETTLEMENT` events, and `settlement_event_next_cursor` is not null in response, the `PERPTRADE` events were paginated, need to take `settlement_event_next_cursor` into request body to query next page of `SETTLEMENT` events.

If the returning events data have `LIQUIDATION` events, and `liquidation_event_next_cursor` is not null in response, the `LIQUIDATION` events were paginated, need to take `liquidation_event_next_cursor` into request body to query next page of `LIQUIDATION` events.

example1: query first page by `account_id` and time range 

```json
{ 
  "account_id": "0x23fe190da12f7bf0f910416b9c1a9723859f3823bb5a19fbc22cd52ff7a9b30d",
  "event_type": "PERPTRADE",
  "from_time": 1720604240,
  "to_time": 1721468240 
}
```

 example2 query next page with `trading_event_next_cursor` from last response: 

 ```json
{ 
  "address": "0x72d5a3ab49c38bf7b2c658a9f1790945a6d308a8",
  "broker_id": "orderly", 
  "event_type": "PERPTRADE", 
  "from_time": 1720604240,
  "to_time": 1721468240, 
  "trading_event_next_cursor": { 
      "block_time": 1720626618,
      "block_number": 14547123,
      "transaction_index": 2,
      "log_index": 44 
    } 
} 
 ```
 example3 query trading events from testnet by shell: 

 ```shell
curl --location 'https://dev-orderly-dashboard-query-service.orderly.network/events_v2' --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data '{
    "account_id": "0x23fe190da12f7bf0f910416b9c1a9723859f3823bb5a19fbc22cd52ff7a9b30d",
    "event_type": "PERPTRADE",
    "from_time": 1720604240,
    "to_time": 1721468240
}'
```
 example4 query settlement events from testnet by shell: 

 ```shell
curl --location 'https://dev-orderly-dashboard-query-service.orderly.network/events_v2' --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data '{
    "account_id": "0x2c5668c26884876b76a894fcaf7fc3b450ac083675277e3de7e4746c552415ef",
    "event_type": "SETTLEMENT",
    "from_time": 1693897830,
    "to_time": 1693897934
}'
```
example5 query liquidation events from testnet by shell: 

```shell
curl --location 'https://dev-orderly-dashboard-query-service.orderly.network/events_v2' --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data '{
    "account_id": "0x1dccb008a39e4926c58be0f6ca292701256cb117c5c810f84c2a1aa4df93dae9",
    "event_type": "LIQUIDATION",
    "from_time": 1696749600,
    "to_time": 1696749740
}'
```
example6 query trasnaction(deposit|withdraw) events from testnet by shell: 

```shell
curl --location 'https://dev-orderly-dashboard-query-service.orderly.network/events_v2' --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data '{
    "account_id": "0x4b725ba3965a77eeaf04acbc6f25e0aac69ca24500f3351d18ec75f09fb2ac11",
    "event_type": "TRANSACTION",
    "from_time": 1693818900,
    "to_time": 1693818980
}'
```

responses.description:
Get Account events response on orderly, it will return account's `trading events` and `***_event_next_cursor`, if `***_event_next_cursor` is not null, you need to to take this data as a param of next page's request. 
        
`trading_event_next_cursor` is filled when `PERPTRADE` were requested(`event_type` is null or `event_type` is `PERPTRADE` on request_body) and next page exist. 
        
 `settlement_event_next_cursor` were requested(`event_type` is null or `event_type` is `SETTLEMENT` on request_body) and next page exist. 
        
 `liquidation_event_next_cursor` were requested(`event_type` is null or `event_type` is `LIQUIDATION` on request_body) and next page exist.

endpoints.summary: Get Account Volume Statistic information
Get Broker Volume Statistic information
Get daily Perpetual trading information
endpoints.description: This api will return `trading_fee`, `trading_count`, `trading_user_count`, `liquidation_amount`: `liquidation_count` and `opening_count` infomation of OrderlyNetwork between `from_days` and `end_days`.

endpoints.summary: Get daily Trading fee information
Get daily Trading volume information

parameters.name: param
parameters.description:
Daily volume params, with day format %Y-%m-%d 

example: {"from_day": "2025-07-12", "end_day": "2025-07-17" }
